verses:
At the Lamb's high feast we sing Praise to our victorious King
Who has washed us in the tide Flowing from his wounded side;
Praise we Christ whose love divine Gives his sacred blood for 
wine,
Gives his body for the feast, Christ the victim, Christ the priest.

Easter triumph, Easter joy, Have the power of sin destroyed.
From the power of sin set free, Newborn souls in Christ are we.
Hymns of glory, songs of praise, Father, unto you we 
raise;
Praise to you, our risen Lord, And the Spirit we accord.
